data1.heading: Power Your Brand Deals
data1.subHead: The simple way to sell, manage, and get paid for your Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube brand deals

data3.heading: Verify your email
data3.subHead: We sent an email to rohit12345@yopmail.com. Check your inbox and enter the 6-digit code to verify your email.

data5.heading: Summarize yourself, this is your title shown on your profile

data6.heading: Describe yourself and your content
data6.textBox: Who are you and what type of content do you create? Who is your audience? Be specific as this will help you show up in searches.
